Achievements.Name: Law of Nature
Achievements.Description: One's ideas must be as broad as Nature if they are to interpret Nature. Well done!

Achievements.Name: The Legacy
Achievements.Description: I must compliment you exceedingly upon the zeal and the intelligence which you have shown.

Achievements.Name: Stage Manager
Achievements.Description: A simple trick, but exceedingly effective!

Achievements.Name: Bomb Defuser
Achievements.Description: You never can resist a touch of the dramatic!

Achievements.Name: A Fine Romance
Achievements.Description: The most winning woman I ever knew was hanged for poisoning. But I digress. You found the letter!

Achievements.Name: Melomania
Achievements.Description: You are a conductor of light!  You discovered the hidden code.

Achievements.Name: Number Lover
Achievements.Description: With all respect for your natural acumen, you handled that very well. You opened the safe box!

Achievements.Name: Master of Deduction
Achievements.Description: Genius is an infinite capacity for taking pains. Bravo!

Achievements.Name: Deduction Apprentice
Achievements.Description: To a great mind, nothing is little.  You completed the first deduction board.

Achievements.Name: Lockpicker
Achievements.Description: I can see that you are a force to be reckoned with.

Achievements.Name: Lazarus
Achievements.Description: An isolated phenomenon? A brain without a heart? I trust that you did not judge me so quickly!

Achievements.Name: Desperately Seeking Sherlock
Achievements.Description: I would have made an actor â€“ and a rare one. You deduced my disguise.

Achievements.Name: Breaking the Law
Achievements.Description: I have a great deal of respect for your judgement.  You opened the safe room!

Achievements.Name: Prison Break
Achievements.Description: A trusty comrade is always of use. Well done. And yet one got away...

Achievements.Name: First-Class Chemist
Achievements.Description: It was the bisulphate of baryta!

Achievements.Name: Pea-Souper
Achievements.Description: Moonshine is a brighter thing than fog, but this is a pea-souper! You asked for Help a great deal.

Achievements.Name: A Very Fine Loafer
Achievements.Description: There are in you the makings of a very fine loafer.

Achievements.Name: The Brain
Achievements.Description: I never get your limits... there are unexplored possibilities about you.

Achievements.Name: Watson Alone
Achievements.Description: The one fixed point in a changing age.

Achievements.Name: Anarchy in the UK
Achievements.Description: There are always some lunatics about. It would be a dull world without them.

Achievements.Name: Minesweeper
Achievements.Description: Your nerves are fairly proof!

Achievements.Name: Finders Key-pers
Achievements.Description: You handled that with less than your usual â€“ that is to say, you handled it well. You found the key!

Achievements.Name: Attention to Detail
Achievements.Description: You have a turn for both observation and deduction!

Achievements.Name: Freedom of the Press
Achievements.Description: The Press is a most valuable institution â€“ if you only know how to use it!

Achievements.Name: The Holmesian
Achievements.Description: I was sure that I might rely on you.  You found all the items from my past adventures.

Achievements.Name: The Gambler
Achievements.Description: You have never failed to play the game!

Achievements.Name: Hidden Message
Achievements.Description: See the value of imagination!

Achievements.Name: Garden Gumshoe
Achievements.Description: With your usual happy mixture of cunning and audacity, you recovered all that was stolen!

Achievements.Name: Sleuth-Hound
Achievements.Description: The beautiful, faithful nature of dogs!

Achievements.Name: Blackmailer
Achievements.Description: Your morals don't improve!

Achievements.Name: Safecracker
Achievements.Description: You would make a highly efficient criminal.

Achievements.Name: Elementary
Achievements.Description: It seems you share my love of all that is bizarre. You recovered the Samoan necklace, well done!
